title: mrfilter
description:
Perform filtering operations on 3D / 4D MR images.

The available filters are: fft, gradient, median, smooth, normalise, zclean.

Each filter has its own unique set of optional parameters.

For 4D images, each 3D volume is processed independently.

References:

axes.title: axes
axes.description: the axes along which to apply the Fourier Transform. By default, the transform is applied along the three spatial axes. Provide as a comma-separate list of axis indices.

magnitude.title: magnitude
magnitude.description: output a magnitude image rather than a complex-valued image

centre_zero.title: centre_zero
centre_zero.description: re-arrange the FFT results so that the zero-frequency component appears in the centre of the image, rather than at the edges

stdev.title: stdev
stdev.description: the standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel used to smooth the input image (in mm). The image is smoothed to reduced large spurious gradients caused by noise. Use this option to override the default stdev of 1 voxel. This can be specified either as a single value to be used for all 3 axes, or as a comma-separated list of 3 values, one for each axis.

magnitude_1.title: magnitude
magnitude_1.description: output the gradient magnitude, rather than the default x,y,z components

scanner.title: scanner
scanner.description: define the gradient with respect to the scanner coordinate frame of reference.

extent.title: extent
extent.description: specify extent of median filtering neighbourhood in voxels. This can be specified either as a single value to be used for all 3 axes, or as a comma-separated list of 3 values, one for each axis (default: 3x3x3).

extent_1.title: extent
extent_1.description: specify extent of normalisation filtering neighbourhood in voxels. This can be specified either as a single value to be used for all 3 axes, or as a comma-separated list of 3 values, one for each axis (default: 3x3x3).

stdev_1.title: stdev
stdev_1.description: apply Gaussian smoothing with the specified standard deviation. The standard deviation is defined in mm (Default 1 voxel). This can be specified either as a single value to be used for all axes, or as a comma-separated list of the stdev for each axis.

fwhm.title: fwhm
fwhm.description: apply Gaussian smoothing with the specified full-width half maximum. The FWHM is defined in mm (Default 1 voxel * 2.3548). This can be specified either as a single value to be used for all axes, or as a comma-separated list of the FWHM for each axis.

extent_2.title: extent
extent_2.description: specify the extent (width) of kernel size in voxels. This can be specified either as a single value to be used for all axes, or as a comma-separated list of the extent for each axis. The default extent is 2 * ceil(2.5 * stdev / voxel_size) - 1.

bridge.title: bridge
bridge.description: number of voxels to gap to fill holes in mask: default: 4

maskin.title: maskin
maskin.description: initial mask that defines the maximum spatial extent and the region from which to smaple the intensity range.

maskout.title: maskout
maskout.description: Output a refined mask based on a spatially coherent region with normal intensity range.

strides.title: strides
strides.description: specify the strides of the output data in memory; either as a comma-separated list of (signed) integers, or as a template image from which the strides shall be extracted and used. The actual strides produced will depend on whether the output image format can support it.

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
